quests.name: First Light
quests.description: Discover your first topic node. Click on a glowing silhouette near any galaxy.
quests.reward_text: You've taken your first step into the Math Universe!

quests.name: Expanding Horizons
quests.description: Discover 5 topic nodes to begin charting the universe.
quests.reward_text: The universe grows with every discovery.

quests.name: Galaxy Hopping
quests.description: Discover at least one topic in 2 different galaxies.
quests.reward_text: You've crossed the void between galaxies!

quests.name: Deep Dive
quests.description: Discover all topics within any single subdomain.
quests.reward_text: You've mastered an entire star system!

quests.name: Five Galaxy Tour
quests.reward_text: Five galaxies explored — you're a true navigator.

quests.name: Century Mark
quests.description: Discover 100 nodes in total (topics, subdomains, and domains).

quests.name: Ten Galaxy Tour
quests.reward_text: Most of the universe has felt your presence.

quests.name: Domain Master
quests.description: Fully explore one entire galaxy (100% discovery).

quests.name: Half the Universe
quests.description: Discover 50% of all nodes in the Math Universe.
quests.reward_text: Halfway there — the universe is half-charted.

quests.name: The Completionist
quests.description: Discover every single node in the Math Universe. 100% completion.
quests.reward_text: You have explored the entire Math Universe. You are the Universal Mind.

standalone.name: Bridge Explorer
standalone.description: Discover 5 nodes that have cross-domain connections.
standalone.reward_text: Bridges between galaxies — you see the connections others miss.

standalone.name: Speed Demon
standalone.description: Discover 30 topics within 15 minutes of starting.
standalone.reward_text: Speed and curiosity combined — blazing through the universe!

standalone.name: Algebra Aficionado
standalone.description: Discover every node in the Algebra galaxy.
standalone.reward_text: The Golden Galaxy has no more secrets from you.

standalone.name: Analysis Adept
standalone.description: Discover every node in the Analysis galaxy.
standalone.reward_text: The Blue Nebula is fully charted.

standalone.name: Geometry Guru
standalone.description: Discover every node in the Geometry galaxy.
standalone.reward_text: The Emerald Cluster shines in full.

standalone.name: Number Ninja
standalone.description: Discover every node in the Number Theory galaxy.
standalone.reward_text: The Rose Spiral reveals all its prime secrets.
